file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-30-09-06 - SERVICE DOOR - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SERVICE DOOR - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives SMRD Zonal Task 52-Z821-213-001-A00. B. Zone: 821. C. Zone Boundaries: STA X = 4514.0 thru STA X = 5292.0. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY SERVICE DOOR - EXTERNAL GENERAL ALL 05-30-09-200-801-A ♦ VISUAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-30-09 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-30-09-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. SERVICE DOOR - EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to done Zonal Task 52-Z821-213-001-A00. (2) The external general visual inspection (GVI) of zone 821 must be done within a touching distance of the items examined. (3) It is a GVI to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be seen easily. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Service door H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the service door. I. Service Door - External General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the service door zone for loose rivets, screws, nicks, cracks, dents, erosion, corrosion, deteriorated protective treatment, or deformation (Figure 601). (2) Examine the service door folding flap structure for condition. (3) Examine the service door folding flap/rod mechanical linkage. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the service door. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-30-09 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
